name: Bit Hockey
description:
Created for GBJAM8

Controls

  • Use 'A' key for dialogue boxes
  • Use mouse control (clicking, dragging) for buttons and for moving the pucks

Bit Hockey is a simple game of air hockey against an AI. To play, you left click and hold the puck with your cursor, and release once you've aimed the puck. Your goal is to get the ball into the other team's goal. Which ever team reaches 3 goals first wins!

Keep in Mind...

  • I'm planning on small updates but,
  • There currently is no music or sound effects due to time crunch
  • The controls aren't Gameboy controls, however, mouse control is better for this type of game. I was planning to add, but also time crunch.
  • You may run into errors, if you do, let me know!

Known Issues

  • Game can break rarely when AI is making a move.
